name: Full on gray google inbox
description: Here's the full on gray inbox. I've tried optimising this theme for readability. If you have any suggestions, please contact me!

user.name: David Campbell
user.about:
I try to follow through with great things that come to mind. I intentionally own my life and my circumstances and I love to be alive.
My most amazing feat is getting to know my wife.

additional_info:
Version History

Version 1.1
Added some nice text-rendering for readability.

Version 1
Hope it works. If it's broken, I'm sorry.

discussions.name: The title is a bit misleading, as email content is still white, but much, much better than any other
I like it but for one detail
